Occupation History:
Mathilde Line Petersen is a 57 year old and comes from Denmark.
Mathilde Line Petersen launched her career as a Drilling Engineer at Maersk Oil A/S, where she gained valuable experience from 1991 to 1992.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Reservoir Engineer at Chevron Denmark A/S in 1992, further expanding her skill set.
Her tenure as a Operations Manager at Total E&P Danmark A/S from 1996 till now was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
